gameDetails.name: Rum & Bones: Nemo the Lost
gameDetails.description:
Nemo, The Lost is a kickstarter exclusive, single character expansion that came with the optional purchase of the Mazu's Dreadful Curse expansion.

Included is a single red hero miniature, a deck cannon miniature and a stat card. He comes in a small brown box unto himself, without retail
packaging art, along with his card and cannon.
